title: Jimmy Carter National Historic Site: Deaf / Hearing Loss
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Accessibility     Deaf / Hearing Loss              Deaf / Hearing Loss       The videos shown at the Jimmy Carter National Historic Site are captioned for the enjoyment of the hearing impaired. The main video, shown in the auditorium, also has an induction loop provided for the benefit of those who use hearing aids. Please contact park personnel at the visitor center desk for assistance with the audio equipment.   For large groups tours that may be in need of a sign language interpreter, please contact our Accessibility Coordinator to make arrangements.
